game.name: Leaf Blower Co.
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Blow your leaves and your cares away in this chilled out work sim. Build up your business, buy new tools, and unlock upgrades - all while watching the leaves fly. After all, one man’s trash is another man’s cash.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Blow your leaves and your cares away in this chilled out work sim. Build up your business, buy new tools, and unlock upgrades - all while watching the leaves fly. After all, one man’s trash is another man’s cash.

reviewHighlights.text: 게임은 평범한 노가다 청소게임인데 최적화가 좀 필요함 최저옵으로 돌리는데도 인방이 같이 안틀어짐
